about_the_game:
Mud Race

Become a world champion in the most slippery race of the world!

Fight yourself to the top of the leagues and drive as fast as possible to earn so many points. Each race will be more difficult for you and in the end you must be the fastest driver to become a world champion.
Many extra points can be earned, and you can even get a spare car. But beware! Every way opening to these extras could block another way leading to the checkpoints.
detailed_description:
Mud Race

Become a world champion in the most slippery race of the world!

Fight yourself to the top of the leagues and drive as fast as possible to earn so many points. Each race will be more difficult for you and in the end you must be the fastest driver to become a world champion.
Many extra points can be earned, and you can even get a spare car. But beware! Every way opening to these extras could block another way leading to the checkpoints.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX560 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct Sound capable card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX 670 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct Sound capable card
